column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf//// I had the 6oz filet mignon middle well
column2: the steak was not flavorful at all!! There's just something off about this steak that just didn't taste right!! I'm just so disappointed!! Like I felt when I took a bite
column3: the middle section tasted kinda weird
column4: like it was a tad still frozen when the meat wasn't thaw out completely!! IDK it's just hard to explain but I wouldn't recommend ordering the steak really dry not flavorful at all!!!
